page.title: 10ABBEY SCHOOL,FORT AUGUSTUS(1
page.content: The people of{Fort-Augustus}were shocked to hear in March 1985 that{ {The Abbey School }was possibly going to close.The closure of this private boarding school would have meant the loss of almost 40 local jobs.These included teachers,groundsmen,catering staff and construction workers.The principal reason for the school's impending closure was lack of pupils.They needed 100 pupils to be viable and the roll was falling. Almost immediately the local district councillor organised the { {Save the Abbey School Action {Committee.}With some help from the local district council this group set about trying to save the school.However things did not look too promising.
